description: This file defines Data Transfer Objects (DTOs) related to Task create/update operations, including request payloads and response structure for the backend of a task management system.

classes.name: TaskDtos
classes.description: Container class for DTOs related to task create/update operations, including nested static classes for request and response payloads.

classes.name: TaskDtos.CreateTaskRequest
classes.description: DTO for creating a new task, including validation annotations for fields.

classes.name: TaskDtos.UpdateTaskRequest
classes.description: DTO for updating an existing task, including optional fields and validation annotations.

classes.name: TaskDtos.TaskResponse
classes.description: DTO representing the task data returned in responses.
